name: ELUDO
description:
Eludo is an explosion of color, sound and touch. Haptic feedback guides your every beat as you challenge your high score and immerse yourself in the geometric orchestra of Eludo.

The spontaneity of the shapes will keep you on your toes and will have you strategically using each portal to your best advantage. Why not lose a few moments to a simple experience that is full of sensation.

Color. Sound. Touch. Fun.
